Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,151 @@
+{
+  "name": "react-native-zustand-wizard",
+  "version": "0.1.0",
+  "description": "A React Native wizard component powered by Zustand",
+  "module": "lib/module/index.js",
+  "types": "lib/typescript/index.d.ts",
+  "react-native": "src/index.ts",
+  "source": "src/index.ts",
+  "files": [
+    "src",
+    "lib",
+    "!**/__tests__",
+    "!**/__fixtures__",
+    "!**/__mocks__"
+  ],
+  "keywords": [
+    "react-native",
+    "zustand",
+    "wizard",
+    "form",
+    "stepper"
+  ],
+  "repository": {
+    "type": "git",
+    "url": "git+https://github.com/zestic/react-native-zustand-wizard.git"
+  },
+  "author": "zestic",
+  "bugs": {
+    "url": "https://github.com/zestic/react-native-zustand-wizard/issues"
+  },
+  "homepage": "https://github.com/zestic/react-native-zustand-wizard#readme",
+  "scripts": {
+    "build": "bob build",
+    "clean": "del-cli lib",
+    "prepare": "bob build",
+    "prepack": "yarn clean && yarn build",
+    "release": "release-it",
+    "typescript": "tsc --noEmit",
+    "lint": "eslint \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx}\"",
+    "test": "jest",
+    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
+    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
+    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx,json,md}\"",
+    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx,json,md}\"",
+    "storybook": "npx expo start",
+    "storybook:ios": "npx expo start --ios",
+    "storybook:android": "npx expo start --android",
+    "storybook:web": "npx expo start --web"
+  },
+  "license": "MIT",
+  "peerDependencies": {
+    "react": ">=18.2.0",
+    "react-native": ">=0.76.0"
+  },
+  "devDependencies": {
+    "@babel/core": "^7.24.0",
+    "@babel/plugin-proposal-export-namespace-from": "^7.18.9",
+    "@babel/runtime": "^7.24.0",
+    "@expo/metro-runtime": "~4.0.1",
+    "@expo/vector-icons": "^14.0.4",
+    "@gorhom/bottom-sheet": "^5.1.2",
+    "@react-native-async-storage/async-storage": "^1.22.3",
+    "@react-native-community/datetimepicker": "8.2.0",
+    "@react-native-community/eslint-config": "^3.2.0",
+    "@react-native-community/slider": "^4.5.0",
+    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-actions": "^8.6.2",
+    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-backgrounds": "^8.6.2",
+    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-controls": "^8.6.2",
+    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-notes": "^8.6.2",
+    "@storybook/core": "8.6.2",
+    "@storybook/react-native": "^8.6.2",
+    "@testing-library/jest-native": "^5.4.3",
+    "@testing-library/react-hooks": "^8.0.1",
+    "@testing-library/react-native": "^12.4.3",
+    "@types/jest": "^29.5.12",
+    "@types/react": "^18.2.64",
+    "@types/react-native": "^0.73.0",
+    "@types/react-native-web": "^0.19.0",
+    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.30.1",
+    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.30.1",
+    "del-cli": "^6.0.0",
+    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
+    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^28.11.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.2.6",
+    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
+    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.2.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-react-native": "^5.0.0",
+    "expo": "^52.0.41",
+    "expo-constants": "~17.0.8",
+    "expo-dev-client": "~5.0.15",
+    "expo-system-ui": "~4.0.8",
+    "jest": "^29.7.0",
+    "prettier": "^3.5.3",
+    "react": "18.2.0",
+    "react-dom": "18.2.0",
+    "react-native": "0.76.0",
+    "react-native-builder-bob": "^0.40.6",
+    "react-native-gesture-handler": "^2.15.0",
+    "react-native-reanimated": "^3.8.0",
+    "react-native-safe-area-context": "^4.9.0",
+    "react-native-svg": "15.8.0",
+    "react-native-web": "^0.19.13",
+    "react-test-renderer": "18.2.0",
+    "storybook": "^8.6.12",
+    "typescript": "^5.0.4"
+  },
+  "dependencies": {
+    "mobx-react": "^9.2.0",
+    "tslib": "^2.6.2"
+  },
+  "eslintConfig": {
+    "root": true,
+    "extends": [
+      "@react-native-community",
+      "prettier"
+    ],
+    "rules": {
+      "prettier/prettier": [
+        "error",
+        {
+          "quoteProps": "consistent",
+          "singleQuote": true,
+          "tabWidth": 2,
+          "trailingComma": "es5",
+          "useTabs": false
+        }
+      ]
+    }
+  },
+  "eslintIgnore": [
+    "node_modules/",
+    "lib/"
+  ],
+  "prettier": {
+    "quoteProps": "consistent",
+    "singleQuote": true,
+    "tabWidth": 2,
+    "trailingComma": "es5",
+    "useTabs": false
+  },
+  "react-native-builder-bob": {
+    "source": "src",
+    "output": "lib",
+    "targets": [
+      "module",
+      "typescript"
+    ]
+  },
+  "packageManager": "yarn@4.1.1"
+}

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "react-native-mst-wizard",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "A React Native wizard component powered by MobX-State-Tree (MST)",
  "module": "lib/module/index.js",
  "types": "lib/typescript/index.d.ts",
  "react-native": "src/index.ts",
  "source": "src/index.ts",
  "files": [
    "src",
    "lib",
    "!**/__tests__",
    "!**/__fixtures__",
    "!**/__mocks__"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "react-native",
    "mobx-state-tree",
    "wizard",
    "form",
    "stepper"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/zestic/react-native-mst-wizard.git"
  },
  "author": "zestic",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/zestic/react-native-mst-wizard/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/zestic/react-native-mst-wizard#readme",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "bob build",
    "clean": "del-cli lib",
    "prepare": "bob build",
    "prepack": "yarn clean && yarn build",
    "release": "release-it",
    "typescript": "tsc --noEmit",
    "lint": "eslint \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx}\"",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx,json,md}\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{js,ts,tsx,json,md}\"",
    "storybook": "npx expo start",
    "storybook:ios": "npx expo start --ios",
    "storybook:android": "npx expo start --android",
    "storybook:web": "npx expo start --web"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "peerDependencies": {
    "mobx": ">=6.12.0",
    "mobx-react-lite": ">=4.0.5",
    "mobx-state-tree": ">=7.0.2",
    "react": ">=18.2.0",
    "react-native": ">=0.76.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.24.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-export-namespace-from": "^7.18.9",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.24.0",
    "@expo/metro-runtime": "~4.0.1",
    "@expo/vector-icons": "^14.0.4",
    "@gorhom/bottom-sheet": "^5.1.2",
    "@react-native-async-storage/async-storage": "^1.22.3",
    "@react-native-community/datetimepicker": "8.2.0",
    "@react-native-community/eslint-config": "^3.2.0",
    "@react-native-community/slider": "^4.5.0",
    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-actions": "^8.6.2",
    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-backgrounds": "^8.6.2",
    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-controls": "^8.6.2",
    "@storybook/addon-ondevice-notes": "^8.6.2",
    "@storybook/core": "8.6.2",
    "@storybook/react-native": "^8.6.2",
    "@testing-library/jest-native": "^5.4.3",
    "@testing-library/react-hooks": "^8.0.1",
    "@testing-library/react-native": "^12.4.3",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.12",
    "@types/react": "^18.2.64",
    "@types/react-native": "^0.73.0",
    "@types/react-native-web": "^0.19.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.30.1",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.30.1",
    "del-cli": "^6.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^28.11.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.2.6",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-native": "^5.0.0",
    "expo": "^52.0.41",
    "expo-constants": "~17.0.8",
    "expo-dev-client": "~5.0.15",
    "expo-system-ui": "~4.0.8",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "mobx": "6.12.0",
    "mobx-react-lite": "4.0.5",
    "mobx-state-tree": "7.0.2",
    "prettier": "^3.5.3",
    "react": "18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "18.2.0",
    "react-native": "0.76.0",
    "react-native-builder-bob": "^0.40.6",
    "react-native-gesture-handler": "^2.15.0",
    "react-native-reanimated": "^3.8.0",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "^4.9.0",
    "react-native-svg": "15.8.0",
    "react-native-web": "^0.19.13",
    "react-test-renderer": "18.2.0",
    "storybook": "^8.6.12",
    "typescript": "^5.0.4"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "mobx-react": "^9.2.0",
    "tslib": "^2.6.2"
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "root": true,
    "extends": [
      "@react-native-community",
      "prettier"
    ],
    "rules": {
      "prettier/prettier": [
        "error",
        {
          "quoteProps": "consistent",
          "singleQuote": true,
          "tabWidth": 2,
          "trailingComma": "es5",
          "useTabs": false
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "eslintIgnore": [
    "node_modules/",
    "lib/"
  ],
  "prettier": {
    "quoteProps": "consistent",
    "singleQuote": true,
    "tabWidth": 2,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "useTabs": false
  },
  "react-native-builder-bob": {
    "source": "src",
    "output": "lib",
    "targets": [
      "module",
      "typescript"
    ]
  },
  "packageManager": "yarn@4.1.1"
}
